interactions.description: Changes the active tab to overview

_ww-text_color.code:
const status = variables['f3b1882d-98c7-44e9-a204-45d8a2131ec0']?.status || 'Unknown';
return status === 'In Progress' ? '#d97706' : status === 'Completed' ? '#15803d' : '#b91c1c'

backgroundColor.code:
const status = variables['f3b1882d-98c7-44e9-a204-45d8a2131ec0']?.status || 'Unknown';
return status === 'In Progress' ? '#fef3c7' : status === 'Completed' ? '#dcfce7' : '#fee2e2'

progressBarColor.code:
const status = variables['f3b1882d-98c7-44e9-a204-45d8a2131ec0']?.status || 'Unknown';
return status === 'In Progress' ? '#f59e0b' : status === 'Completed' ? '#22c55e' : '#ef4444'

options.code: return { responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, plugins: { legend: { position: "right", labels: { padding: 20, font: { size: 14 } } }, datalabels: { color: "white", font: { weight: "bold", size: 14 }, formatter: function(value, ctx) { const dataArray = ctx.chart.data.datasets[0].data; if (!Array.isArray(dataArray)) { return dataArray }; const total = dataArray.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0); const percentage = ((value / total) * 100).toFixed(1); return percentage + "%"; } } } }

interactions.description: Updates the start date in the form data
